description: This Flutter widget defines a payment screen for a mobile application, allowing users to select a payment method and process payments through an external payments service.

classes.name: PaymentScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the payment screen where users can choose a payment method and initiate payment processing.

classes.name: _PaymentScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the payment options, processing state, and user interactions within the PaymentScreen.

methods.name: _processPayment
methods.description: Handles the payment process by calling the external PaymentsService, manages loading states, and provides user feedback via SnackBars.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the payment screen, including UI for selecting payment options and initiating the payment.
